00001 import java.awt.Point;

00021 public final class GameState_Opt7x6 implements GameStateModule
00022 {
00023         private final static int WIDTH = 7;
00024         private final static int HEIGHT = 6;
00026         private final static int H1 = HEIGHT + 1;
00028         private final static int H2 = HEIGHT + 2;
00029         private final static int SIZE = HEIGHT * WIDTH;
00031         private final static long TOP = 0x1020408102040L;
00033         private final long color[] = new long[2];
00035         private final int moves[] = new int[SIZE];
00037         private int nplies = 0;
00038         private int coins = 0;
00040         private final byte height[] = new byte[WIDTH];
00041         private boolean gameOver = false;
00042         private int Winner;
00043         private boolean pointsComputed = false;
00044         private Point startPt;
00045         private Point endPt;
00046 
00048 
00053         public GameState_Opt7x6()
00054         {
00055                 color[0] = color[1] = 0L;
00056                 for(int i = 0; i < WIDTH; i++)
00057                         height[i] = (byte) (H1 * i);
00058         }
00059 
00061         public GameState_Opt7x6 copy()
00062         {
00063                 final GameState_Opt7x6 game = new GameState_Opt7x6();
00064                 System.arraycopy(color, 0, game.color, 0, 2);
00065                 System.arraycopy(moves, 0, game.moves, 0, SIZE);
00066                 System.arraycopy(height, 0, game.height, 0, WIDTH);
00067                 game.nplies = nplies;
00068                 game.coins = coins;
00069                 game.gameOver = gameOver;
00070                 game.Winner = Winner;
00071                 return game;
00072         }

00075 
00081         public boolean canMakeMove(final int x)
00082         {
00083                 if(x < 0 || x >= WIDTH || gameOver)
00084                         return false;
00085                 final long newBoard = color[nplies & 1] | (1L << height[x]);
00086                 return (newBoard & TOP) == 0;
00087         }
00088 
00090 
00094         private boolean computeVictory(final long board)
00095         {
00096                 long temp = board & (board >> HEIGHT);
00097                 if((temp & (temp >> 2 * HEIGHT)) != 0) // check diagonal \
00098                         return true;
00099                 temp = board & (board >> H1);
00100                 if((temp & (temp >> 2 * H1)) != 0) // check horizontal -
00101                         return true;
00102                 temp = board & (board >> H2); // check diagonal /
00103                 if((temp & (temp >> 2 * H2)) != 0)
00104                         return true;
00105                 temp = board & (board >> 1); // check vertical |
00106                 return (temp & (temp >> 2)) != 0;
00107         }
00108 
00110 
00117         public void unMakeMove()
00118         {
00119                 final int n = moves[--nplies];
00120                 color[nplies & 1] ^= 1L << --height[n];
00121                 coins--;
00122                 gameOver = false;
00123                 pointsComputed = false;
00124         }
00125 
00127 
00136         public void makeMove(final int x)
00137         {
00138                 if(!canMakeMove(x))
00139                         throw new RuntimeException("Illegal Move: " + x);
00140                 color[nplies & 1] |= 1L << height[x]++;
00141                 ++coins;
00142                 if(computeVictory(color[nplies & 1]))
00143                 {
00144                         gameOver = true;
00145                         Winner = (nplies & 1) + 1;
00146                 }
00147                 else if(coins == SIZE)
00148                 {
00149                         gameOver = true;
00150                         Winner = 0;
00151                 }
00152                 moves[nplies++] = x;
00153         }
00154 
00156 
00159         public boolean isGameOver()
00160         {
00161                 return gameOver;
00162         }
00163 
00165 
00175         public int getWinner()
00176         {
00177                 if(!gameOver)
00178                         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot get winner; game isn't over.");
00179                 return Winner;
00180         }
00181 
00183 
00187         public int getActivePlayer()
00188         {
00189                 return (nplies & 1) + 1;
00190         }
00191 
00193 
00202         public int getAt(final int x, final int y)
00203         {
00204                 final long bit = 1L << (x * H1 + y);
00205                 if((color[0] & bit) != 0)
00206                         return 1;
00207                 if((color[1] & bit) != 0)
00208                         return 2;
00209                 return 0;
00210         }
00211 
00213 
00217         public int getHeightAt(final int x)
00218         {
00219                 return height[x] - (x * H1);
00220         }
00221

00226         public int getWidth()
00227         {
00228                 return WIDTH;

00235         public int getHeight()
00236         {
00237                 return HEIGHT;

00244         public int getCoins()
00245         {
00246                 return coins;

00256         public Point getStartPt()
00257         {
00258                 if(!gameOver)
00259                         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot get start/end points until the game is over");
00260                 if(!pointsComputed || startPt == null)
00261                         computePoints();
00262                 if(startPt == null)
00263                         throw new RuntimeException("Could not compute points");
00264                 return startPt;
00265         }
00266 
00268 
00274         public Point getEndPt()
00275         {
00276                 if(!gameOver)
00277                         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot get start/end points until the game is over");
00278                 if(!pointsComputed || endPt == null)
00279                         computePoints();
00280                 if(endPt == null)
00281                         throw new RuntimeException("Could not compute points");
00282                 return endPt;
00283         }
00284 
00286         private void computePoints()
00287         {
00288                 if(Winner == 0)
00289                 {
00290                         startPt = new Point(-1, -1);
00291                         endPt = new Point(-1, -1);
00292                 }
00293 
00294                 for(int x = 0; x < WIDTH; x++)
00295                         for(int y = 0; y < HEIGHT; y++)
00296                         {
00297                                 if(getAt(x, y) != Winner)
00298                                         continue;
00299                                 for(int dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++)
00300                                         next:
00301                                         for(int dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++)
00302                                         {
00303                                                 if(dx == dy && dy == 0)
00304                                                         continue;
00305                                                 if(x + (3 * dx) >= WIDTH)
00306                                                         continue;
00307                                                 if(y + (3 * dy) >= HEIGHT)
00308                                                         continue;
00309                                                 if(x + (3 * dx) < 0)
00310                                                         continue;
00311                                                 if(y + (3 * dy) < 0)
00312                                                         continue;
00313                                                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00314                                                         if(getAt(x + (i * dx), y + (i * dy)) != Winner)
00315                                                                 continue next;
00316                                                 startPt = new Point(x, y);
00317                                                 endPt = new Point(x + (3 * dx), y + (3 * dy));
00318                                                 return;
00319                                         }
00320                         }
00321         }
00322 }
